title: The Road to Ruin (1934, Drama) Helen Foster, Nell O'Day, Glen Boles | Full Movie

sources.title: The Road to Ruin (1934, Drama) Helen Foster, Nell O'Day, Glen Boles | Full Movie
sources.description:
High-powered roadsters, gin-parties, back-seat petting - does it spell destruction for the girl of this age?
A young girl gets involved with a crowd that smokes, drinks alcohol and does the horizontal tango. She winds up an alcoholic, pregnant, drug addict and is forced to undo the pregnancy.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/vmEDLuqLIgg


Original title: The Road to Ruin  (1934)
This film has subtitles in many languages.

Directors: Dorothy Davenport, Melville Shyer
Writer: Norton S. Parker
Stars: Helen Foster, Nell O'Day, Glen Boles
Genres: Classics, Drama, Propaganda film, Post-Code


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
06:26 Teenage girls navigate friendships, family dynamics, and romantic interests in a dramatic setting.
11:37 Drama unfolds as relationships and emotions intertwine during a social gathering.
26:36 A night of partying leads to drama and misunderstandings among a group of young adults.
38:38 A story of deception and redemption involving young girls and their mothers facing consequences of their actions.
52:26 Tragic events unfold as a family faces illness, secrets, and ultimately, death.
